com.intellect25.model

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellect25.model.Parser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Regex

    public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
implements Regex
    This class is managing of parsing of text and search words from first sentence in remain text, and display words that absent into first sentence.
    Author:
    Riabchenko Aliona
